casebody.data:
Alan CAPPS
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES OF NORTH CAROLINA, INC., a North Carolina Corporation, Ronald Brodie, and Chris Reedel. No. 383A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 16, 2005. David P. Ferrell, Raleigh, Norman W. Shearin, Jr., Kitty Hawk, for NW Sign Industries, et al. Jared E. Gardner, Charlotte, for Capps.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 15th day of September 2005 for Writ of Supersedeas and Motion for Temporary Stay of the judgment of the Court of Appeals in this matter, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th day of September 2005."
